name: Create a new contact in Ontraport with an assigned campaign from a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new row is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a contact in Ontraport (provided it doesn't already exist) with a campaign specified in the spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1oAFBzGZlhq4VsWEMN_qYAOBdxWoif28JpTdWtRMbvYM/edit?usp=sharing).
